tasks.title: Set Up Project Structure
tasks.description: Initialize the project repository and set up the basic file structure for the Sports Field Booking Platform prototype.
tasks.details: Create a new Git repository. Set up a basic folder structure including 'src', 'public', and 'assets'. Initialize package.json with necessary dependencies for a React or Vue.js frontend framework.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify that the project structure is correctly set up by checking the presence of all required folders and files.

tasks.title: Develop Landing Page
tasks.description: Create the landing page that displays the hero section, field photos, and a 'Book Now' CTA.
tasks.details: Use HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to build the landing page. Ensure responsiveness and fast loading. Use dummy data for field images and descriptions.
tasks.testStrategy: Conduct user testing to ensure the landing page is visually appealing and the 'Book Now' button functions correctly.

tasks.title: Implement Booking Form
tasks.description: Create a booking form with fields for name, email, and phone number with validation.
tasks.details: Develop a form component that includes required field validation and basic format checks. Implement error and confirmation states using UI feedback.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the form for validation errors and ensure that successful submissions trigger the appropriate confirmation state.

tasks.title: Schedule Selection Functionality
tasks.description: Implement the schedule selection feature allowing users to choose location, date, time, and duration.
tasks.details: Create a component for selecting available slots using dummy data. Include a confirmation screen before proceeding to payment.
tasks.testStrategy: Simulate various user selections and verify that the correct availability is displayed and the confirmation screen appears as expected.

tasks.title: Dummy Payment Flow
tasks.description: Develop a dummy payment flow that simulates payment success and failure.
tasks.details: Create a payment component with buttons for 'Simulate Success' and 'Simulate Failed'. Use dummy data to simulate payment outcomes.
tasks.testStrategy: Test both payment scenarios to ensure that the correct messages are displayed for success and failure.

tasks.title: Booking Confirmation Screen
tasks.description: Create a confirmation screen that displays booking success or failure messages.
tasks.details: Design a confirmation component that shows a success message, booking ID, and a static barcode image for successful bookings, or an error message for failures.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify that the confirmation screen displays the correct information based on the payment outcome.

tasks.title: Owner Dashboard Development
tasks.description: Develop a simple owner dashboard to view bookings and details.
tasks.details: Create a dashboard component that lists user bookings, including user name, schedule, and payment status. Include a barcode preview for each booking.
tasks.testStrategy: Ensure that the dashboard displays dummy booking data correctly and that the barcode preview functions as intended.

tasks.title: Simulate Barcode Ticketing
tasks.description: Implement a simulation for barcode ticketing for booking confirmation.
tasks.details: Generate a static barcode image for each booking confirmation using a library like 'bwip-js' or similar.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify that the barcode is generated correctly and can be displayed on the confirmation screen.

tasks.title: Responsive Design Implementation
tasks.description: Ensure that the entire prototype is mobile-friendly and responsive.
tasks.details: Utilize CSS media queries and flexible layouts to ensure the UI adapts to different screen sizes.
tasks.testStrategy: Conduct testing on various devices and screen sizes to ensure that the layout is responsive and user-friendly.

tasks.title: User Acceptance Testing
tasks.description: Conduct user acceptance testing to gather feedback on the prototype.
tasks.details: Organize sessions with potential users to navigate through the prototype and provide feedback on the user experience.
tasks.testStrategy: Collect qualitative feedback and observe user interactions to identify areas for improvement.
